Description:
Position Title:             Sous ChefEmployment Type:     Full TimeSalary:                        up to 10K AED all-inclusive depending on experience and qualificationsJob Location:            Dubai, UAE About the Client:High-end casual dining restaurant Job Description:Directs food preparation and collaborates with executive chef.
Helps in the design of food and drink menu.
Produces high quality plates, including both design and taste.
Oversees and supervises kitchen staff.
Assists with menu planning, inventory, and management of supplies.
Ensures that food is top quality and that kitchen is in good conditionSkills
Skills:
Open to Asian nationals
38 years old and below
At least 3 years solid experience as sous chef in a high-end casual dining
Candidates who can join immediately will be prioritized

Preferred.Nationality: Central Asia; East Asia; South Asia; Southeast Asia; West Asia
